title: Wage $20, sandwich $0.50, find number of workers

content.prompt: Given the production information in the table above, how many workers would be employed if the wage rate were $20.00 per day and if sandwiches sold for $0.50?

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
